entry.title: My last day at Yoolk
entry.summary: I almost couldn’t believe it, but on Friday, September 23rd was my last day at Yoolk. I joined to work at Yoolk since July, 2007. Since then I really enjoyed in learning and was a part of the team. I would say it’s a place that not only changes my career

entry.title: 2011 will be my Ruby and OSS year
entry.summary:
Last a few months, I have relearned my Ruby skill, and I have enjoyed the language. So this year I decided 2011 will be my Ruby year, and I will do open source projects and contribute to some existing open source projects in that technology.

entry.title: 12 Things every Programmer should know
entry.summary: Last weekend, I had a chance to give a presentation about 12 Things Every Programmer Should Know at BarCamp Phnom Penh 2010 which is a biggest IT event in Cambodia. Cambodia is a developing country that still limited human resources, but it is growing
